info.title: eBaoCloud OpenAPI for Mobile BFF (Backends for Frontends)
info.description:
This document is the API specification for the eBaoCloud Life part. To practice and run the APIs in this document, you need to apply an eBaoCloud tenant account(starting from a sandbox account instead of production account) first.
Contact liliang.zhu@ebaotech.com for more information and trial using. # Built on Thu Dec 28 2017, 03:37:54 +08:00 # Versioning API version| Date |Comments

post.description: Update proposal information and call insurer's inforce service after the payment callback
Update proposal information and call AnXin's inforce service after the payment callback

parameters.name: payType
parameters.description:
Pay Type
1 - WeChat-mobile
2 - Alipay-mobile
3 - WeChat-PC
4 - Alipay-PC
5 - WeChat-App
6 - Alipay-App
7 - WeChat-wap
8 - UnionPay-wap

parameters.name: payRemark
parameters.description: Pay Remark(when failed , show failure reason)

post.description: Call eBaoCloud benefit illustration calculation serivce
Calculate the premium and verify the insurance underwriting rules, if passed, then generate an insurance policy number
After the premium collection, issue the policy
Calculate the premium and verify the risk of insurance
Login through httpbasic, and update openId after login

get.description: Get proposal information by proposal ID
Get proposal information by proposal code
Get proposal (list) information by user ID

post.description: Enquiry propoal base on the according conditions
Update proposal information (UW result, e-policy download URL, proposal status)

get.description: Get WeChat user basic information through OpenId and tenantCode

addressId.description: Address internal serial number, UUID type

chargePeriod.description:
Payment period type, non-empty
1 - single
2 - per year
3 to a certain age
4 - whole life

coveragePeriod.description:
Coverage type
1 - whole life
2 - per year
3 - Cover to a certain age
4 - per month
5 - per day

premium.description: Insurance premium, non empty when calculate SA base on premium

unit.description: Product unit, non empty when by unit insurance

accountType.description:
Account type, 2 debit card
8 - credit card

bankAccountCity.description: The city, the bank account belongs to

bankAccountProvince.description: The province, the bank account belongs to

creditCardType.description:
Credit card type, if not credit card, be empty
1 - Master
2 - Visa
3 - BCA
4 - JCB

debitCreditType.description:
Account use
0 - pay and use
1 - fee
2 - refund

paymentMethod.description:
First time payment method, integer
1 - cash
2 - check
3 - bank transfer
30 - credit card

paymentMethodNext.description:
Renewal payment method, integer
1 - cash
2 - check
3 - bank transfer
30 - credit card
